title: Veteran's Scars PBE changes
body:
Health increased to  10/20/30/40/50 from 9/18/27/36/45

Thank you Riot, you have outdone yourself
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/851/799/74c.gif

Edit: 
Just in case anyone wanted to see proof 
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-t6zktDi4SPg/V09kWjElKLI/AAAAAAAAPuI/Lp-vP80P7iURySf0GwmSg4j6Rkyck1abACKgB/s1600/veterans%2Bscars.jpg

replies.body: wow. 5HP more, that's a lot. It's the difference it makes in life and death.
